com.cognos.CAM_AAA.authentication

Interface ISingleSelectDisplayObject

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IDisplayObject, ITextDisplayObject
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IMultiSelectDisplayObject
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MultiSelectDisplayObject, SingleSelectDisplayObject

    public interface ISingleSelectDisplayObject
extends ITextDisplayObject
    Defines the interface to use for implementing a single selection display object. A single selection display object, which is used in a form when prompting the user, contains a selection list that allows only one item to be selected.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ISelectOption[] getOptions()
      Returns the options that are available for the user to select.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.cognos.CAM_AAA.authentication.ITextDisplayObject

        getCaption

      • Methods inherited from interface com.cognos.CAM_AAA.authentication.IDisplayObject

        getName, getValue

    • Method Detail

      • getOptions

        ISelectOption[] getOptions()
        Returns the options that are available for the user to select. Returns null if no selection options exist.
        Returns:
        An array containing the selection options for this display object.
